title: Will the Massachusetts Legislature pass an economic development bill by August 2024?
body: This question will resolve as YES if, by August 31, 2024, the Massachusetts Legislature passes an economic development bill. The bill must be officially approved and signed into law.

article_information.article_description: The Massachusetts Legislature has ended its 19-month formal session. title: Will Intel lay off more than 15% of its workforce by August 2024?
body: This question will resolve as YES if, by August 31, 2024, Intel has laid off more than 15% of its workforce. The layoff must be publicly confirmed by Intel through an official announcement or reported by at least two reputable news organizations (e.g., BBC, The Guardian, New York Times, Washington Post).

title: Will there be a published book on Nüshu by August 2024?
body: This question will resolve as YES if, by August 31, 2024, a book on Nüshu, the centuries-old, secret female-only script from southern China, is published and available for purchase. The book must be listed on major book retail websites such as Amazon or Barnes & Noble. If no such book is published by the resolution date, this question will resolve as NO.

article_information.article_description: Chen Yulu is a self-proclaimed ambassador of a script once known only to a small number of women in southern China.
